entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VMR CI build failures during restore: The "RestoreTask" task returned false but did not log an error #41477
  • publish container fills up the /tmp/Containers/Content directory over time #41467
  • `slnx` wildcard support #41465

Closed

  • GivenThatWeHaveAPackageReferenceWithAliases tests failing in CI #39068
  • Build_Components_WithDesktopMSBuild_Works appears to be failing flakily #39960
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk unable to authenticate to private DevOps NPM feed since 0.5.105-alpha #41017
  • [NETSDKE2E] Running dotnet test in the mstest project will generate a redundant file on Linux and Mac #40398
  • Same SDK version, different contents #9321
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Dispose HttpClient and Stream in AddPackageParser #41490
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dispose HttpClient in WorkloadManifestUpdater #41489
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Dispose IDisposables in AssemblySymbolLoader #41487
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Disable CET compatibility setting on apphost when `CetCompat` property is set to `false` #41483
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Specify a version of cmake in global.json #41476
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [Static Web Assets] Remove tokens before trying to match paths in static web assets #41482
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add tab completion for 'dotnet nuget why' command #41430
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Add tab completion for 'dotnet nuget why' command #41448
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use ZipFile.ExtractToDirectory for extracting nupkg in tests #41479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Resolve tokens before copying files #41468
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Dispose ZipArchive after usage in ExtractArchiveToDirectory #41449
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Fingerprint all assets #41244
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • filter references for satellite assembly generation down to just the primary assemblies #38504
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Enable the Respecting Item's Culture by default #41042
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove Out-of-Support .NET Core SDK 2.x Download Link #41396
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41440
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • remove installer from version file #41316
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • source-build: bundle NativeAOT libraries with the SDK. #41198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
